Html:
Really looking forward to your next release hoping it will solve some of the issues around building of navigation panes programatically. My app just isn't functioning in a testable manner with out it.
When is the next release coming?

Thanks for your hard work.

Sorry, my day job has had me working so many hours for the last couple of months that I’ve had little time for the project. I wish I could just work on the controls. :-)

I have most of the programmatic navigation pane page add issues fixed at this point. I’m hoping to get the release candidate out yet late this week. Sorry for the delay.

Thanks,
Scorn

If you are interested I will send you an install of the latest version. I think the changes are pretty complete now. Send me your email address at ascend_adm@hotmail.com if so. It would actually be helpful to see if I have covered everything.

Thanks,
Scorn

I sent the install. Let me know if you don’t receive it. :-)

Thanks,
Scorn
I didn't, just emailed you an ftp location to push to. Thanks!

I've sent it to that FTP address.

Thanks,
Scorn

Schwing!

small problemo so pong back to you. Look for email w/ attachment of sample project.

I sent you a new install to your FTP site. There was a problem with the navigation pane page collection clear method. I think this build has it. :-)

Thanks,
Scorn
Shout out to the whole group. These controls rock. Thanks! Keep on keeping on.
